name: Ext_R5_MedicationDispense_partOf
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationDispense.partOf for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.partOf from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Event that dispense is part of
element.definition: The procedure or medication administration that triggered the dispense.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.partOf` maps to R4B `MedicationDispense.partOf`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
